About the Company: Piramal Enterprises Ltd is one of the largest pharmaceutical companies in India.The company operates two divisions namely healthcare solutions and pharma solutions.The products and services offered by the company includes Pharma Solutions- This division is engaged in manufacturing of API and formulations in nine therapeutic areas. The company operates one of the leading custom manufacturing businesses in the world, due to this PHL offers a full lifecycle partnership to small/virtual and big pharma. They provide services such as clinical phase APIs, clinical phase formulations and commercial APIs. They also offer packaging solutions.Healthcare solutions- Under this, PHL has developed multi-ingredient formulations and single-ingredients products.
